1598673600.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
1598673600.descr: Follow financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics, hearing their life stories and how they became people thay are today.

1598675400.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1598675400.descr: The movers and shakers of the world of high tech industries are interviewed, discussed and analysed in this insightful look at the major player in the technological revolutions as they happen. From face-to-face interviews to detailed breakdowns of the mechanisms both behind and in operation, the programme explores the currents shaping the ever changing world we live in.

1598677200.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1598677200.descr: Take a look at all the latest news in business, finance and where the markets are headed in this show that focuses on macro issues with a Middle Eastern context. The programme is broadcast from Dubai and hosted by Yousef Gamal El-Din and Manus Cranny.

1598680800.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1598680800.descr: The movers and shakers of the world of high tech industries are interviewed, discussed and analysed in this insightful look at the major player in the technological revolutions as they happen. From face-to-face interviews to detailed breakdowns of the mechanisms both behind and in operation, the programme explores the currents shaping the ever changing world we live in.

1598682600.title: Bloomberg Big Decisions
1598682600.descr: The real decision makers are here given a forum to tell their own stories. The people who stand behind the biggest political and economic decisions, the powerhouses of international business sit down with David Westin to discuss their rise to the top and what the decisions were that brought them to the fore and the ranks of those who really decide the direction the world takes.

1598684400.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
1598684400.descr: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry.

1598688000.title: EVs: on the Brink of Change
1598688000.descr: Electric vehicles are expected to explode as a more dominant means of mobility in the near future. Bloomberg's Alix Steel explores topics such as market demand, technology and infrastructure.

1598691600.title: Coronavirus: Downturn Damage Control
1598691600.descr: Leading figures in business and finance discuss the impact of the coronavirus pandemic, and how they plan to limit the long-term damage to their companies, industries and portfolios.

1598693400.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1598693400.descr: The movers and shakers of the world of high tech industries are interviewed, discussed and analysed in this insightful look at the major player in the technological revolutions as they happen. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry.

1598698800.title: Beyond Innovation
1598698800.descr: Beyond Innovation uncovers the world's new and emerging technologies, changing the way we live and do business.

1598700600.title: High Flyers
1598700600.descr: Steve McCurry, Master Photographer. If a picture paints a thousand words then Steve McCurry's work is limitless. He's a world-famous photographer who focuses on conflict and culture.

1598702400.title: Art+Technology
1598702400.descr: Captivating documentary series that follows various talented artists from around the world that make art with the help from technology. Technology is changing the way we make, experience and share our ideas, and viewers will have a chance to see how some artist use it to make incredible art, thus creating a completely new genre.

1598707800.title: At the Top
1598707800.descr: Sebastien Bazin, Accor Group, CEO. They are the largest European hotel group and a global heavyweight. Sebastien Bazin, the CEO of Accor Group, joins us At The Top in Dubai.
